name: SaintMegery15
text: Only been here twice, but had an awesome experience! My instructor was Laura and she was great! Highly recommend checking the place out regardless of your experience level.

name: Taylor Goodwin
text: Such a fun and positive environment. I have never felt more welcomed and accepted than I have with my pole family. Elle runs the best studio in Alabama, and employs the best instructors. Everyone is so uplifting and encouraging through the process of learning and perfecting pole tricks safely. I couldn’t praise Elle or her instructors enough. The studio has changed my life and given me so much confidence in my self and in what I can accomplish, in and out of the studio. I leave every class with something new, and it’s my favorite way to work out!

resp.text: Taylor, you are a joy and a complete beast. We love having you at the studio!

name: Brandi Darty
text: I love taking classes at Studio Steel.  Elle and her fellow teachers always make me feel welcome, confident, and comfortable. Pole is such a fun exercise! I was hooked at my Taste of Pole almost a year ago. Give Pole a chance! You won’t regret it!

resp.text: Thanks Brandi, we love having you at the studio!

name: Stephanie Smith
text: Fantastic studio! The most amazing instructors; they really care about their students progress and want to help in every way. I have loved the classes I’ve taken so far and will definitely be back for more.

name: jenny machen
text: I’ve been attending classes for about 5 months now and I feel wonderful! If you don’t like the gym and want to try something different this is the perfect place for you. I’ve always felt encouraged here, and have felt myself become so much stronger both physically and mentally! It isn’t easy, but it is SO WORTH IT!

resp.text: You are a source of endless fun and positivity! I am so glad you chose Studio Steel - I love how you try everything without screaming lol

name: Nneka Gunn
text:
I went from someone who didn't think very much of herself to someone who has not in only grown in strength physically, but mentally as well. Today, I am stronger, more confident, and more fit than I've ever been and it is all thanks to the love, support, and instruction I've received from the owner Elle and her wonderful team of instructors.

I recently competed at PSO Southern on the Studio Steel Team and I won a gold medal!!! I'm three months into pole sport and this is the type of results I've received in such a short period of time.

If you like to workout in a judge-free environment filled with people of all backgrounds then this is the place to be. Prices are great, the instructors are incredible, and I'm delighted to say that I've gained a whole new family with my pole sisters!

See you in class!

resp.text: You are a ray of sunshine in the studio! You are always encouraging and inspiring to everyone, and as for your gold medal: YOU DID THAT and it was just plain beautiful to watch. xoxo

name: Peyton Stanley
text: Amazing community and supportive instructors who always listen. Very considerate of each person's limits and will help you find ways to do things you didn't know you were strong enough to accomplish. Welcoming and wonderful.

resp.text: We love you Peyton! Thanks for the confidence in us!

name: Kathryn at Redemptive Cycles
text: Elle & the community are wonders. I love this studio so much: it is welcoming, inclusive, encouraging & SO FUN! I've done a progressive class here, had a surprise bday party (BEST Dirty Thirty party EVER - props to Elle for helping my beau pull that off), and have done several stand-alone classes. Each experience left me feeling empowered, strong and sexy AF. You may be timid to walk in but you'll feel like a million dollars when you walk out!

name: Demiboy Dorito
text: awesome classes and atmosphere!!! very kind and talented folks!

name: Destinee Marie
text: Going to class at Studio Steel is definitely my favorite place to go/do through out the week. Corinne an Elle are some of the most friendliest people I have been delighted to meet. I have started learning this form of dance as a complete beginner with no experience in really any dancing or fitness and Corinne has been an excellent and patient teacher!

resp.text: Thanks, Destinee! It's great to see you getting stronger and flexier and learning those pretty moves!

name: Cassie Renfro
text: I love going to Studio Steel! I started as a complete beginner and have loved it from the first second of class. It’s a super inclusive and friendly atmosphere where everyone is welcome. It’s a great way to get a full body workout with amazing people!

resp.text: Thanks, Cassie! Your progress has been so much fun to watch!

name: J D Porter
text: Finally, a professional vertical fitness facility in B'ham!  Pole is an incredible workout and it's greatly enhanced when the instructors and the studio are top notch, like they are here.  Studio Steel is a new, unique, and very comfortable space that really lets you focus on the workout.  I so like the look and feel of the place.  The pleasant surroundings, ample parking, professional equipment, and quality accessories in the boutique let it all come together.  Definitely worth a visit.  And, they've got a great $10 "Taste of Pole" option that newbies should absolutely check out.

resp.text: Thanks, JD - that means a lot coming from you! I know you are a huge fan of all things pole and it's good to know you approve. xoxo

name: Who Knows
text: I would give it 5, but while I loved Elle's energy I was totally turned off by Corinne. She just didn't seem to know the difference between what's appropriate to speak about as a teacher and what isn't. She just was a major over sharer of her personal life, and the worst part was her young son is feet away possibly listening to his mother talk about inappropriate things.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. I don't think you are alone in this opinion. She doesn't work here anymore, and the new instructors are far more professional in both their conversation and their teaching. Please come try another class and see what I mean! xoxo Elle

name: Kasi C McPherson
text: Stopped going to the gym and started coming here for my fitness. It’s so much fun and love the instructors.

name: Madame Camembert
text: Studio Steel is welcoming and inclusive. Instructor Corinne is enthusiastic, accomplished, and very strong - an excellent spotter who will never let you down. Pole is so much fun!

resp.text: Merci, Madame! Five stars for you too!

name: Isabel Medina
text: Love the studio and love Elle. The space is very cool and clean. It was a wonderful class and a great workout!

resp.text:
(Translated by Google) I love you Isabel!

(Original)
Te amo, Isabel!

name: Leslie Williams
text: Such a welcoming and inviting place. No matter your skill level, you can call Studio Steel home!

name: Dolores Esme
text: Fabulous place! Great for group parties

resp.text: Thanks, Dolores! Glad you had fun!

name: Anna Marie Pitts
text: I had the Ham Classic,  it is BY FAR THE BEST SANDWICH I HAVE EVER ATE!!! ❤️❤️ I definitely recommend this eatery.

name: Paula Maharrey
text: Love their food! We order lunch from them often at work! Great service!

name: Shelby Bevis
text: Could literally eat here everyday. Service is lovely and very cleanly.

name: Mike Clark
text:
Amy and the ladies here are fantastic!  If you need to feed an office or just your family, go here.  Their box lunches are excellent!
Thanks Amy for doing such a great job.
Mike C.

name: Kevin
text: Great place to eat in the Mall if you like a healthy lunch! Got the cobb salad today and it is awesome!  Amy and her crew are awesome too!!

name: Brad Stanfield
text: Excellent sandwiches but a little pricey

name: Manisha Ande
text: The food is delicious and fresh. If you work in the  florence Mall you get a discount. Thank me later😉🙃

name: Candice Morgan
text: Chance is one of the best employees ever! He always goes above and beyond to make sure my experience there is amazing

name: Catrina Russell
text: They did not put all the sauces on the sandwich. And the broccoli salad is dry. This is like the 3rd time this has happened

resp.text: Hi Catrina - Thank you for reaching out to us. We’re truly sorry to hear you were unhappy with your recent Honey Baked Ham purchase, and we’d welcome the opportunity to learn more about your experience. The fastest way to get your issue resolved is through our Customer Service Portal: http://www.honeybaked.com/contact-us.asp. We hope to receive your feedback so that we can discuss further.

name: J Burbank
text: Great ham! Great sandwiches! Great customer service!

name: Kevin Turner
text: The chicken salad sandwich is my favorite and the owner is very special. It's our go-to place in the mall

name: Matthew Evetts
text: I eat here almost once a week, always get great food and great service.

name: Maranda&Paul Godwin
text: Always up to my standards, an that's not easy I assure you...

name: Steve Merry
text: Delicious ham salad and broccoli salad.

name: Justin Hoffman
text: Love this place!

name: Bonnie Mccullars
text: Fantastic service and great food

resp.text: Thank you Bonnie! We want to ensure you are given the service and quality that is deserved.

name: Sheila Stephens
text: Kind of expensive for what you get, nothing special, overpriced sandwiches.

name: Gary Utley
text: Great lunch.

name: Debbie Mayhall
text: My family loved the sliced turkey and sliced ham.

name: Annea Sims
text: Great food!!

name: Ryan Setliff
text: Awesome.

name: Joshua Grigsby
text: Great food always fresh!

name: Anna Wooten
text: Smoked Turkey Breast is awesome!

name: Pokeypuppy 105
text: Great prices, food, and prices

name: Kirsten Maresh
text: Best sandwhich ever!!!
